content: After resting at the nearby Shrine, you can look for a small cliffside path below the shrine for a Snake-Head Mushroom, and then start your ascent to the top of the mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Cave'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the nearby Shrine, you can look for a small cliffside path below the shrine for a Snake-Head Mushroom, and then start your ascent to the top of the mountain.
